objects.text:
• Hand-crafted premium leather construction
• Unique scalloped design with artistic stitching
• Comfortable padded interior with cushion technology

product_details.name: Artisan Comfort: Bohemian Leather Sneaker with Decorative Stitching
product_details.description:
• Hand-crafted premium leather construction with intricate decorative patterns
• Unique scalloped design details and artistic stitching
• Comfortable padded interior with moisture-wicking lining
• Durable rubber sole with bubble-cushion technology
• Rust-colored contrast laces for stylish accent
• Two-tone leather combination in cream and tan shades
• Flexible and lightweight design for all-day comfort
• Perfect blend of casual and artistic style
• Custom decorative heel patch for added flair
• Available in unique bohemian-inspired design

banner_details:
This banner features a stylish and earthy-toned layout promoting a handcrafted leather sneaker. It is divided vertically into two sections. The left section has a warm gradient background with circular abstract elements for texture, over which multiple text elements are layered: a bold headline (“heading”), a stylish subheadline (“subheading”), a bullet point feature list (“description”), a price tag (“price”), and a call-to-action button with text (“cta_button” and “cta”). The right section showcases the sneaker product image (“product_image”), floating over a light cream base with subtle wave line patterns. The composition is modern, clean, and balances text and visuals effectively.

**Color Palette:**
- Warm Beige: `#E8D5B5`
- Cream: `#F9F2E5`
- Deep Brown: `#8B4513`
- Burnt Sienna: `#A3632E`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image features a warm, dessert-inspired color palette primarily consisting of caramel, beige, cream, and burnt orange tones. The use of gradient blending across textures gives a rich, artisanal feel, reminiscent of baked goods. The base color is a soft beige (#F5D2A1), complemented by creamy highlights (#FFF3E1) and deeper amber tones (#C66A29) in the laces and midsole. The darker brown accent on the sole (#5E2E11) provides depth and contrast. Subtle gradients and layered lines emphasize the shoe’s intricate design, drawing attention to each decorative component while maintaining a harmonious, playful aesthetic perfect for an ad banner.
